localize.title: Buzzing on Youtube
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Youtube in your native language

blogPost.excerpt:
For this video, we'll be doing a Conor McGregor vs Dustin Poirier 2 full fight recap for UFC 257, covering all of the highlight moments, including Dustin Poirier's knockout win over Conor McGregor, and Michael Chandler's knockout of Dan Hooker. This marks the first time Conor McGregor has ever been knocked out in his entire MMA career.

âœ”ï¸ Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/c/AllThingsMMA?sub_confirmation=1 
âœ”ï¸ Merchandise: https://teespring.com/stores/allthingsmma

Contact:

ğŸ¤Voiced by: Jack White - https://twitter.com/radio_jwhite

blogPost.body:
For this video, we'll be doing a Conor McGregor vs Dustin Poirier 2 full fight recap for UFC 257, covering all of the highlight moments, including Dustin Poirier's knockout win over Conor McGregor, and Michael Chandler's knockout of Dan Hooker. This marks the first time Conor McGregor has ever been knocked out in his entire MMA career.

âœ”ï¸ Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/c/AllThingsMMA?sub_confirmation=1 
âœ”ï¸ Merchandise: https://teespring.com/stores/allthingsmma 
âœ”ï¸ Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/AllThingsMMA

previous.excerpt:
Seizures can be scary. Even for lifeguards. We look at how Bondi's lifeguards have handled seizures on the beach in these emotional and scary moments. 
SUBSCRIBE - http://bit.ly/subscribebondirescue
Buy Official Merch NOW - bit.ly/YTbondimerch

â€”

Bondi Rescue follows the work of the elite professional #Lifeguards who patrol Australiaâ€™s busiest beach. This is Australiaâ€™s real life Baywatch! Taking the viewers on their journey through mass rescues, drownings, resuscitations, shark sightings, and all number of the weird and wonderful experiences Bondi Beach dishes up. 

In #BondiRescue the audience sees the action through the eyes of real characters and #lifeguards like Hoppo, Deano, Reidy, Jesse, Maxi, Whippet and Harries, as they catch thieves, perform CPR, treat #seizures make drug busts, break up fights, and even handle a navy bomb that washes ashore one afternoon. Every year throws up new and completely unexpected challenges, and how lifeguards adapt is what makes Bondi Rescue a show thatâ€™s about much more than swimmers being saved in the surf.

SUBSCRIBE to Bondi Rescue to get the latest clips, behind the scenes info, #realliferescues and MORE!
